channel.title: Multiple choice teleports
channel.description: I'm coding a delta 317 source and I was wondering how I would make it so I have multiple choices when I click a portal, for example, if I click a portal that teleports me to minigames, how would I make it so it says like [Quote]which minigame? barrows Gsmini Dbmini Void mini [/quote]
